name: Fallen Sky Online
description:
Immerse yourself in a world after the nuclear war and experience tough adventures in the wastelands!
Play online with others and experience the exciting story of Fallen Sky!

You can also gather resources, craft items, trade, create a clan, communicate with other players via InGame Chat, and
along with others through the numerous missions.

Fallen Sky Online is a 2D RPG adventure multiplayer game that plays about 200 years after the Great War.
In the beginning you start in the small but dangerous city "Bad Kreuznach" in the North - Palatinate in order to free the deported children from the clutches of the mercenaries,
go through the ruined streets and drive through the city and always be on the alert ... it could attack you badly.
In addition there are many more interesting cities or areas waiting for you who will create it in the future by patch in the game again and again to offer something new!


Enter the world of Fallen Sky and let yourself be mesmerized.
